Hi. I'm Caroline.

Full-Stack Web Developer.UI/UX Engineer.

  •  about

    I'm a passionate and enthusiastic web-developer experienced in both Front-end and Back-end development. I'm currently living in Chicago and looking for opportunities in Chicago or San Francisco/Bay Area.

    I wake up every day excited to code. I love constantly learning new things, and teaching others what I know. Thanks for checking out my site and please email me about any job opportunities...or just to say hello!

    Full Stack Developer & Founding Member

    Cofounding member of small team affiliated with University of Chicago developing a social communication web app. Our team won space at 1871, an entrepreneurial hub for digital startups in Chicago, as part of their College New Venture Challenge.

    Clinical Database Manager

    Northwestern University Division of Gastroenterology 2009-2014

    Designed and developed a clinical relational database management systems for Division. Initiated and coordinated the implementation of a increasingly scalable division-wide integrated database management and electronic data capture research platform.

    Publications in Peer-Reviewed Journals
